name: genie.cgi-curl-SSRF
notes: Implement strict URL whitelisting for all curl requests. Consider removing this functionality if not absolutely necessary.

name: genie.cgi-http_status-bypass
notes: Implement additional validation for HTTP responses, including signature verification where possible.
